name: Frequency Finder
description:
Frequency Finder

Made for the PIGSquad July summer slow jam, Frequency Finder allows you to play around with combining frequencies and challenges you to try and match a randomized pair. Unfortunately the browser version does not have any audio however the windows and mac builds are fully functional. It's a bit bare bones as far as games go but seeing and making all kinds of crazy waveforms is really fascinating!

If you're interested I have put the source code up on github! https://github.com/ThomasWoods/MusicFirstJam
